author: Marco Fioretti
description:
As Europe flirts with “reliable proprietary technologies” and India rolls out open source healthcare AI, Amanda Brock is drawing a sharp line between genuine openness, marketing spin, and outright control.

The post From Brussels to Bengaluru: Amanda Brock on AI Openness and Digital Sovereignty appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: From Brussels to Bengaluru: Amanda Brock on AI Openness and Digital Sovereignty
